Deteriorating cash position from 56.8M to 6.56M over 3 years

Debt levels consistently exceed assets by significant margin

interest_coverage.trend_analysis: Insufficient earnings to cover interest expenses
investigation_points: EBIT insufficient to cover interest payments
Significant financial distress in 2022 with negative coverage

inventory_turnover.trend_analysis: Slowing inventory turnover increasing from 45 to 70 days
investigation_points: Inventory verification issues reported in all audit reports

asset_turnover.trend_analysis: Improving but still below optimal levels

gross_profit_margin.trend_analysis: Significant improvement but offset by massive financial expenses
investigation_points: Improving gross margins but net profitability remains minimal

return_on_equity.trend_analysis: Negative returns on negative equity base
investigation_points: Negative equity makes ROE calculation distorted
